roleset.note: STEEL-V NOTES: Framed by Ben. (from steel.01-v)

example.name: arg0 == arg1
example.text: She had even steeled herself [*] to keep Juanita upstairs in the nurse 's room off the empty nursery , although the girl tried [*-1]to insist on [*] moving back to the quarters [*] to spare Kate remembrance of the baby 's death .
